title: "CRC and ENDO recurrent 5 frameshift mutation intersect"
author: "Qian"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```

```{r}
files <- list.files(here("data"), "recurrent_5", full.names = T, recursive = T)
```


```{r}
recur <- lapply(files, read.delim, sep = "\t")
crc <- recur[[1]] %>% mutate(source = "CRC") %>% distinct()
endo <- recur[[2]] %>% mutate(source = "ENDO") %>% distinct()
intersect <- inner_join(recur[[1]], recur[[2]], by = join_by(gene, transcript, mutation, label), unmatched = "drop", suffix = c(".crc", ".endo"))
```

```{r}
head(intersect)
```
